sense.def: название реки в Дигории; в русских источниках — Урух
the name of the river in Digoria; in Russian sources — Urukh

cit.quote: leʒgæj gædi xurfi awwon tunʒuj Iræymæ Xæznidon

cit.q: несясь среди лесов в тени, спешит к Ирафу Хазнидон (приток Ирафа)
rushing among the forests in the shade, the Khaznidon (the tributary of the Iraf river) is on his way to the Iraf

cit.quote: leʒgæj gædi xurfi awwon tunʒuj Iræymæ Xæznidon

cit.q: несясь среди лесов в тени, спешит к Ирафу Хазнидон (приток Ирафа)
rushing among the forests in the shade, the Khaznidon (the tributary of the Iraf river) is on his way to the Iraf

entry.etym: From %iir-æf%i, where %iæf%i = Old Iranian %iар-%i ‘water’, ‘river’, literally “the river of Irs (Ossetes)”?
